sentences: Mees ja naine annavad kingitusi lastele.
Tegelikult meie vanemad ei anna raha kõigile soovitele.
context: The Estonian word 'annavad' is the third-person plural present indicative form of the verb 'andma', meaning 'to give'. It refers to what they (multiple people/things) are giving or providing in the current moment. The subject would be in the nominative case and plural number, indicating multiple givers.
